AUTHOR: Adargi
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing the Remastered Edition of Kowlin's Punish
This cog allows you to temporarily mute users.

For setup instructions please see the GitHub Wiki(<https://yrhenogledd.space/Gallafant/wiki>)
For support: <https://discord.gg/xZsSxXp>

If you like my work and want to support me then please share this with your friends
NAME: Punish
DESCRIPTION: Punish a misbehaving user. This places a user into timeout. Removing his/her right to talk in ALL channels.
